data.trans_hint: Ai đó đã đột nhập vào nhà chúng tôi tuần trước.
data.en_hint: Someone broke into our house last week.
data.content_game_1: Someone broke into our house last week.
data.answer_en_hint: Someone broke into our house last week.

data.trans_hint: Một nhóm cầu thủ bóng đá đi ngang qua trước cửa nhà tôi.
data.en_hint: A team of football players passed by my front door.
data.content_game_1: A team of football players passed by my front door.
data.answer_en_hint: A team of football players passed by my front door.

data.trans_hint: Ở trên sân, anh ta luôn phải đuổi theo bóng.
data.en_hint: On the pitch, he always has to run after the ball.
data.content_game_1: On the pitch, he always has to run after the ball.
data.answer_en_hint: On the pitch, he always has to run after the ball.

data.trans: Rời đi, chạy trốn (sau khi lấy đồ gì)
data.trans_hint: Con chó chạy mất lấy luôn đôi xăng đan của cô ấy.
data.en_hint: The dog ran off with her sandals.
data.content_game_1: The dog ran off with her sandals.
data.answer_en_hint: The dog ran off with her sandals.

data.trans_hint: Bộ phim mới sẽ tiếp tục ở chỗ phần trước kết thúc.
data.en_hint: The new movie takes up where the last one left off.
data.content_game_1: The new movie takes up where the last one left off.
data.answer_en_hint: The new movie takes up where the last one left off.

data.trans: Ăn cắp, ăn trộm và thoát được tội đó
data.trans_hint: Tên trộm đã lấy đi thiết bị máy tính trị giá 30.000 đô la mà không bị bắt.
data.en_hint: The thief got away with computer equipment worth $30 000.
data.content_game_1: The thief Got away with computer equipment worth $30 000.
data.answer_en_hint: The thief Got away with computer equipment worth $30 000.

data.trans: Lưu ý đến (ai hay thứ gì)
data.trans_hint: Cảnh sát nhắc mọi người lưu ý đến người đàn ông mặc đồ đen.
data.en_hint: The police told people to be on the lookout for the man in black.
data.content_game_1: The police told people to be on the lookout for the man in black.
data.answer_en_hint: The police told people to be on the lookout for the man in black.

data.trans: Phạt nặng tay (đối với ai hoặc tội gì)
data.trans_hint: Tôi mong chính quyền sẽ phạt nặng tay với những kẻ ăn cắp trong khu vực.
data.en_hint: I hope that the authority would crash down on robbers in the area.
data.content_game_1: I hope that the authority would crash down on robbers in the area.
data.answer_en_hint: I hope that the authority would crash down on robbers in the area.

data.trans_hint: Tôi thực sự sốc khi thấy cô gái đó bị bắt cóc ngay giữa thanh thiên bạch nhật.
data.en_hint: I was shocked to see the girl being kidnapped in broad daylight.
data.content_game_1: I was shocked to see the girl being kidnapped in broad daylight.
data.answer_en_hint: I was shocked to see the girl being kidnapped in broad daylight.
